articles.author: Sheila Chiang
articles.title: Microsoft to open new data center in Thailand as it doubles down on AI and Southeast Asia - CNBC
articles.description: The U.S. tech giant said it will also commit toward AI skills training for over 100,000 Thais and support local developers.
articles.content: Microsoft chairman and CEO Satya Nadella on Wednesday announced "significant commitments" to build a new regional data center in Thailand, among other initiatives, as the U.S. tech giant doubles down… [+1696 chars]
